author: Special Correspondent
text:
An abandoned baby, which was under the care of Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital for the past few days, was handed over to the Government Cradle Baby Scheme on Tuesday.

The girl baby was found abandoned at the Mohan Kumaramangalam Hospital on March 6. She was admitted to the neonatal intensive care unit for medical intervention.

After she recovered, Kesavalingam, resident medical officer of the hospital, handed her over to N. Indirajith, Child Protection Officer, Department of Social Defence, on Tuesday. She was later admitted to the adoption unit of the Government Cradle Baby Scheme, an official press release issued here said.
title: Abandoned baby handed over to cradle baby scheme
